summary.span: Contains a list of selectable items.

span.span: Contains a list of selectable items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，這表示它可以包含任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板） 之物件的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 中的多個項目是可見的不同於，其中包含只選取的項目可見，除非屬性是`true`。More than one item in a is visible, unlike the , which has only the selected item visible unless the property is `true`. 屬性會決定是否超過其中一項目中是可選取的一次。The property determines whether more than one item in the is selectable at a time. 屬性會決定多少個項目，使用者可以選取一次。The property determines how many items a user can select at one time. 您可以將屬性設定為（預設）、 ，或。You can set the property to (the default), , or . 下表描述這些列舉值的行為。The following table described the behavior of these enumeration values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||使用者可以選取一個項目，一次。The user can select only one item at a time.| ||使用者可以選取多個項目，不需按著輔助按鍵。The user can select multiple items without holding down a modifier key.| ||使用者可以選取多個連續的項目時按住 CTRL 鍵並按一下項目按住 SHIFT 鍵或非連續的項目。The user can select multiple consecutive items while holding down the SHIFT key or non-consecutive items by holding down the CTRL key and clicking the items.| 控制項通常會與資料繫結使用。 controls are often used with data binding. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 顯示項目數量龐大，可能會造成效能問題。Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues. 請參閱[最佳化效能： 控制項](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md) for more information. ## 自訂清單方塊控制項Customizing the ListBox Control 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態，請參閱[清單方塊樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/listbox-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ListBox Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/listbox-styles-and-templates.md). 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響該屬性是否存在於這兩控制項的預設範本，並且使用設定的。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立並訂閱事件。The following example creates a and subscribes to the event. [!code-xaml[ListBoxEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[ListBoxEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ListBoxEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#2)]
